TFBS-0.5.0::TFBSTop
Matrixbase class for matrix patterns, containing methods common to all
MatrixSetan agregate class representing a set of matrix patterns, containing methods for manipulating the set as a whole
PatternGena base class for pattern generators
PatternIinterface definition for all pattern objects (currently includes matrices and word (consensus and regular expressions )
Sitea nucleotide sequence feature object representing (possibly putative) transcription factor binding site.
SitePairSeta set of TFBS::SitePair objects
SiteSeta set of TFBS::Site objects
Wordbase class for word-based patterns

TFBS-0.5.0::TFBS::PatternGenTop
AnnSpeca pattern factory that uses the AnnSpec program
Elpha pattern factory that uses the Elph program
Gibbsa pattern factory that uses Chip Lawrences Gibbs program
MEMEa pattern factory that uses the MEME program
SimplePFMa simple position frequency matrix factory
YMFa pattern factory that uses the MEME program

TFBS-0.5.0::TFBS::DBTop
FlatFileDirinterface to a database of pattern matrices stored as a collection of flat files in a dedicated directory
JASPAR2interface to MySQL relational database of pattern matrices
JASPAR4interface to MySQL relational database of pattern matrices
LocalTRANSFACinterface to local transfac database position frequency matrices (matrix.dat) -------------------------------- NOTICE ---------------------------------- The TRANSFAC database is free for non-commercial use. For commercial use the TRANSFAC databases and programs have to be licensed. Please read the DISCLAIMER at http://transfac.gbf.de/TRANSFAC/disclaimer.htm. -------------------------------------------------------------------------
TRANSFACinterface to database of TRANSFAC public position frequency matrices at TESS (http://www.cbil.upenn.edu/tess) -------------------------------- NOTICE ---------------------------------- The TRANSFAC database is free for non-commercial use. For commercial use the TRANSFAC databases and programs have to be licensed. Please read the DISCLAIMER at http://transfac.gbf.de/TRANSFAC/disclaimer.htm. -------------------------------------------------------------------------

ICMclass for information content matrices of nucleotide patterns
